ch.ethz.ee.tik.sop.pisalib.variator
Class Variator

java.lang.Object
  ch.ethz.ee.tik.sop.pisalib.variator.Variator

public class Variator
extends java.lang.Object

The main variator class. Reads the command line arguments, instantiates the population, the file manager and the state machine, initializes (state = 0) and starts the state machine.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Tamara Ulrich
